verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> most <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G5290>returning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2871>slaughter<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3307>gave<s%> a tenth <S%G1181>part<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all;<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G3303><s%> being by <S%G2059>interpretation<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> after <S%G1899>that<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> which <S%G3603>is,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

Without <S%G540>father,<s%> without <S%G282>mother,<s%> without <S%G35>descent,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> made like <S%G871>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>continually.<s%> <S%G1336><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2334>consider<s%> how <S%G4080>great<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> was, unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3966>patriarch<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G1181>tenth<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G205>spoils.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that are <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> who <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> office of the <S%G2405>priesthood,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to take <S%G586>tithes<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> that <S%G5123>is,<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2539>though<s%> they <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3751>loins<s%> of Abraham: <S%G11><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he whose descent is not <S%G1075>counted<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> received <S%G1183>tithes<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> him that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1181>tithes;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> he receiveth them, of whom it is <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as I may so <S%G5613>say,<s%> <S%G2031><s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3017>Levi<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> who <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G1181>tithes,<s%> paid <S%G1183>tithes<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5050>perfection<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3020>Levitical<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood,<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> received the <S%G3549>law,)<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2089>further<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> was there that <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> should <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> being <S%G3346>changed,<s%> there is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%> a <S%G3331>change<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> are <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G3348>pertaineth<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G5443>tribe,<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> gave <S%G4337>attendance<s%> at <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2379>altar.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G4271>evident<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G393>sprang<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2455>Judah;<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood.<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1096>made,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of a <S%G4559>carnal<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of an <S%G179>endless<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3140>testifieth,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>forever<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> a <S%G115>disannulling<s%> of the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> going <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G772>weakness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G512>unprofitableness<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> inasmuch <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%> he was made priest:

By <S%G2596><s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1450>surety<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>testament.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G1526>were<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2409>priests,<s%> because they were not <S%G2967>suffered<s%> to <S%G3887>continue<s%> by reason of death: <S%G2288><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> man, because <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>continueth<s%> <S%G1519>ever,<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G531>unchangeable<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G4241>became<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> who is <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G172>harmless,<s%> <S%G283>undefiled,<s%> <S%G5563>separate<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5308>higher<s%> than <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens;<s%>
